interestingFact: Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
Japan has more vending machines than any other country in the world, approximately 5 million.
Iceland has no mosquitoes despite its diverse natural environment.
India is the largest producer of milk in the world.
The Pyramids of Giza are the only remaining Wonder of the Ancient World.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which produces 20% of the world’s oxygen.
Norway is known as the 'Land of the Midnight Sun' because certain areas have sunlight 24 hours a day during summer.
The Great Wall of China is the longest wall in the world, stretching over 13,000 miles.
South Africa has three capital cities, each serving a different purpose.
The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during summer due to thermal expansion.
